About:
Hi, I’m Itay Levy.

I’m a full-stack and game developer  
who loves creating immersive, interactive experiences.
From code to design, I build digital worlds  
and explore ideas at the edge of tech and creativity.

This island is a part of that journey.

ProjectCards.name: Amdocs
ProjectCards.description: Innovative 3D web store, including VR experience, offering customers new ways to engage with their telecom provider including features like: Universal Wagon asset - innovative 3D asset which can be integrated into any Metaverse or 3D Environment, GenAI Customer Service Agent - GenAI powered AI that you can talk and interact with in VR, and more...

ProjectCards.name: Battle Lab
ProjectCards.description: As part of my service, I took part in the development of 3D Military simulations aimed for testing and evaluating new military technologies and weapons, including Infantry and Infantry-based systems, UAVs, Vehicles, etc.

ProjectCards.name: My Portfolio
ProjectCards.description: This project, built using React, Three.js, and varying AI tools, including Hunyuan3D-2 for 3D assets generation, and Dall-E for textures generation.

ProjectCards.name: Autonomous Vehicle
ProjectCards.description: Autonomous Vehicle Simulator, including driving along pre made route, object detection, and monitor logging all the detected objects details. Made using Unity and C#.
